lyrics:
4 contributorsdetroit waves lyricsverse 1
so we let it go to start again

and the lights illuminate the exit signs
over the wings the skies an open endless sea

goodnight

verse 2

ill still say your name to fall asleep
over and over a cynic sayin rosary
a liar living make believe

goodnight

beneath
me now
if i could if i could change
